sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		Name as string,
		Address as string,
		Phone as string,
		Qualification as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
